metadata.title: CVE-2023-52841 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:vidtv: mux: Add check and kfree for kstrdup Add check for the return valueof kstrdup() and return the error if it fails in order to avoid NULLpointer dereference. Moreover, use kfree() in the later error handling inorder to avoid memory leak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
